FILE: cm230666v11.0.txt
DYAD: SPAIN - ISRAEL
RIVALRY: RIV626
DISPUTE(S): MID2917 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20171224
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20171224

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2917 

TERRMID: MID2917 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2917 3 -- uncertain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2917 from Gibler, Miller, and Little (2016), Israel forced down a Spanish passenger plane in Israeli airspace that ignored orders to land. The plane was held less than 24 hours, and there was no protest from either country, so GML recommend this case be dropped; therefore coded uncertain. 

TERRLINK: MID2917 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2917 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2917 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2917 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2917 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2917 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2917 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2917 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2917 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2917 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2917 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2917 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2917 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2917 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

Gibler, D.M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
